name: Runtsage
summary: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions.
description:
Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions. You gain the Adopted Ancestry general feat and must select goblin as the feat's chosen ancestry. You also gain one 1st-level goblin ancestry feat.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
